A

actionRadius - Variable in class pcaCollisionDetection.CollisionElement
Elements within this radius will cause a call of the collision() function.

Adds a CollisionElement to the Set of Elements that will be tested.

CollisionElement - Class in pcaCollisionDetection

CollisionMap - Class in pcaCollisionDetection
Divides the screen in quadrants of a certain gridSize and places each given element in its quadrant.
